application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 14 (CLC1 b) Contamination - Quantitative risk assessment and remediation strategy) of planning permission PP/20/06260 (Creation of new basement level with associated lightwells, extension of existing front lightwell, rear extension at lower ground floor level, replacement of existing rear extension at ground floor level, single storey side extension, alterations to fenestration and installation of new windows including roof lights, creation of dormers in replacement roof, installation of plant, new planting of tree to front of property, associated cycle storage, bin storage and landscaping)
